questionTitle: The government ___ interest rates for three years until yesterday.
The six children were ___ by him alone.
The temperature has ___ all day long.
He had ___ flowers every year until this year. Now he grows only vegetables.
I like ___ at 6am, but my husband stays in bed until 8am.
If it doesn't stop raining, the river will ___ and overflow.
Jane has ___ in her company very quickly and is now CEO.
If you have a question, please ___ your hand.
Mary ___ her voice when she's angry.
He ___ his eyebrows, as if surprised.
